main event: A suspected satellite was observed in the Pacific Ocean in 1964.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by the USAF and occurred on July 9, 1964.
The object was observed for around 3 hours, from 12:28 to 15:22.
The location of the sighting was in the Pacific Ocean at coordinates 45-00N 172-30W.
The report states that the object was evaluated as a satellite by the reporting unit.
The report was retransmitted to the CIA.
